Dear Dr. Skornia:
We are happy to announce the opening of the NAEB EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION
AND RADIO PLACEMENT SERVICE as of May 1*, 19£ii® This free placement ser¬
vice is available to all educational television and radio organizations
whether or not they are members of the NAEBo Full time operation is now
possible through a grant from the Fund for Adult Education*, an independent
organization established by the Ford Foundationo
In opening your new television station*, you will of course be needing ex¬
perienced persons in various positions. We will be glad to help you find
qualified personnel if you will send us information about the positions you
will have available*, such as the number of engineers*, production men*, teeh-
nieans*, etc®*, plus a brief description of each job*, including age require¬
ments*, educational qualifications*, experience and salary®
In the near future we plan to issue job analysis and description materials
to facilitate job classification throughout the educational television and
radio field®
Could you please advise us to whom we should address our letters and pub~
lications for any further correspondence?

Very truly yours*,
